Astronomy Tower Landing.description: You are on a landing in the Astronomy Tower. In the west wall is a blue door with a bronze knocker set into it. A spiral staircase winds up and down.
Astronomy Tower Landing.name: Astronomy Tower Landing

Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.description: The statue creakily walks a pace towards you to expose a hole in the floor. It seems to be a very dark tunnel.
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.name: Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.wrong_password: The statue's single eye fixes on you displeasedly.
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.password_prompt:
You approach the singularly ugly statue, apparently of Gunhilda of Gorsemoor.
You have the impression that the statue is waiting for you to say something.

paths.w: Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage

WestThirdEWCorr.description: You are at the western end of a third-floor corridor. In a nook in the far western corner is a statue of a one-eyed, humpbacked witch.
WestThirdEWCorr.name: WestThirdEWCorr

Top of Astronomy Tower.description: You are out on the roof of the Astronomy Tower. The view is spectacular.
Top of Astronomy Tower.name: Top of Astronomy Tower

SEGreatHall.description: You are in the SE corner of the Great Hall. There is a stairway to the south and a door to the east.
SEGreatHall.name: SEGreatHall

Myrtle's Bathroom.description: You are in a disused girls' lavatory on the second floor. Someone is crying messily in one of the stalls. The sinks are arrayed in a curious circle, and the circular floor tile in the center of the sink-circle looks like it moves.
Myrtle's Bathroom.name: Myrtle's Bathroom

Flying.description: You are soaring above the Quiddich pitch!
Flying.name: Flying

East Library.description: You are in the library. Stacks of books lie scattered on tables and comfy chairs that are perenially dappled with late afternoon sunshine. The restricted section is to the west and there is a broad archway to the north through which you can glimpse stairs leading down and stripes of green, red, blue, and yellow.
East Library.name: East Library

Slytherin Common Room.description: You are in the Slyterin Common Room. There are windows that appear to look out into the lake.
Slytherin Common Room.name: Slytherin Common Room
Slytherin Common Room.wrong_password: The door grates on its hinges as it shouts, 'BEGONE'!

Potions Classroom.description: You are in the Potions classroom. Herbs hang from the ceiling. There is a general air of misery.
Potions Classroom.name: Potions Classroom

Ravenclaw Common Room.description: You are in the Ravenclaw Common Room.
Ravenclaw Common Room.name: Ravenclaw Common Room
Ravenclaw Common Room.password_prompt: The eagle-shaped knocker intones, Which came first, the phoenix or the flame?

Hufflepuff.description: You are in the Hufflepuff Common Room. It is full of overstuffed armchairs. There is a large tapestry on the east wall and a fireplace on the west wall.
Hufflepuff.name: Hufflepuff

Path to Hogsmeade.description: To your east is a set of imposing gates. They appear to be locked. You can just make out Hogsmeade at the end of the long path to your west. There is a hole in the ground near your feet.
Path to Hogsmeade.name: Path to Hogsmeade

Disused Room.description: You are in a disused classroom.
Disused Room.name: Disused Room

SouthSecondNSCorr.description: You are at the southern end of a north-south corridor in Lion Tower. There is a doorway to the west and a stairway going down.
SouthSecondNSCorr.name: SouthSecondNSCorr

Gryffindor.description: You are in the Lion House Common Room! The circular room is filled with large comfy armchairs. Scarlet and gold hangings line the walls. A fire crackles in the fireplace. There is a hole in the wall to the west.
Gryffindor.name: Gryffindor
Gryffindor.wrong_password: 'Sorry dear, that was last week. Or the week before. Run along now.'
Gryffindor.password_prompt: Dawn French coughs lightly and says, 'Password?'

EastThirdEWCorr.description: You are at the eastern end of a third-floor corridor. There is a closed door in the north wall and a staircase going down.
EastThirdEWCorr.name: EastThirdEWCorr

West Library.description: You are in the restricted wing of the library. A chill, slightly ominous draft stirs dust motes in the air. There's a doorway to the north. The main section of the library is to the east.
West Library.name: West Library

Stair Hall.description: You are in a room with many stairways that appear to be continuously moving. There is a large door in the south wall, a small door in the north wall, and a broad archway to the east.
Stair Hall.name: Stair Hall

NWGreatHall.description: You are in the NW corner of the Great Hall. There is door to the west, behind the teacher's table. There is also a path to the north.
NWGreatHall.name: NWGreatHall

NEGreatHall.name: NEGreatHall
NEGreatHall.description: You are in the NE corner of the Great Hall. A doorway lies behind a tapestry to the north, and a stairway leads down.

Quidditch Pitch.description: You are on the Quidditch pitch. Why don't you explore?
Quidditch Pitch.name: Quidditch Pitch

WestSecondEWCorr.description: You are at the western end of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. A stairway leads down and the rest of the corridor extends east.
WestSecondEWCorr.name: WestSecondEWCorr

Hospital.description: You are in the hospital wing. The exit is to the south.
Hospital.name: Hospital

Kitchen.description: You are in the castle kitchen. Pots are boiling, fires are crackling, and sinks bubbling. The main door is to the west.
Kitchen.name: Kitchen

Chamber of Secrets.description: You are in the Chamber of Secrets.
Chamber of Secrets.name: Chamber of Secrets

Chute.description:
You slide down the dark chute and land in front of a door covered with elaborate snake carvings. When you repeat the hissing noise you made upstairs, the snakes writhe and the door swings open.
The Chamber of Secrets has been opened!
Chute.name: Chute

Headmaster's Tower.description: You are in a small octagonal room in the Headmaster's Tower. A passageway leads south. A staircase that is more of a ladder disappears through a trapdoor in the ceiling. A door-sized gargoyle is on the east wall.
Headmaster's Tower.name: Headmaster's Tower

NorthSecondNSCorr.description: You are at the northern end of a north-south corridor in Lion Tower. There is a portrait of Dawn French on the eastern wall. A passage leads north and a narrow stairway is to the west.
NorthSecondNSCorr.name: NorthSecondNSCorr

Filch's Office.description: You are in a small, spotless room. A filing cabinet stands in the corner and a discontented cat hisses at you from the floor.
Filch's Office.name: Filch's Office

Headmaster's Office.description: You are in the Headmaster's Office.
Headmaster's Office.name: Headmaster's Office

Owlery.description: You have climbed to the Owlery. The floor is cluttered with feathers and small bones.
Owlery.name: Owlery

Astronomy Tower Hall.description: You are on a low level of the Astronomy Tower. A spiral staircase winds up and down, and there are passageways to the north and south.
Astronomy Tower Hall.name: Astronomy Tower Hall

Third Floor Corridor.description: You are in a non-descript third-floor corridor. There is a passage to the west and a door in the south wall.
Third Floor Corridor.name: Third Floor Corridor

CentralSecondEWCorr.description: You are in the middle of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. There is another corridor to the south, and stairways leads up and down from here.
CentralSecondEWCorr.name: CentralSecondEWCorr

EastSecondEWCorr.description: You are at the eastern end of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. There is a disused classroom to the north, and a stairway to the east.
EastSecondEWCorr.name: EastSecondEWCorr

South Basement Corridor.description: You are at the southern end of a basement corridor. It is decidedly less pleasant here than the northern end. The walls are covered with foul slime. A heavy door is in the south wall. Emerald green gems light the stairway leading down.
South Basement Corridor.name: South Basement Corridor

Gargoyle.description: The gargoyle swings out to reveal a stone spiral staircase.
Gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
Gargoyle.wrong_password: The gargoyle continues to survey you impassively.
Gargoyle.password_prompt: You can't be sure, but the gargoyle seems to blink at you as you approach it.

North Basement Corridor.description: You are at the northern end of a basement corridor. The hall is filled with the smell of baking bread. The kitchens are through a low archway to the east and there is a circular door in the wall to the north.
North Basement Corridor.name: North Basement Corridor

Castle Gates.description: You are inside the Hogwarts main gates. The castle is to the west. You can just make out Hogsmeade down a long path through the gates. The gates are locked.
Castle Gates.name: Castle Gates

Emerald Hall.description: You are in a hall encrusted with emeralds. An ebony door is set into the southern, gem-like wall. A grimy passageway leads east. A green-lit stairway goes up.
Emerald Hall.name: Emerald Hall

The Quad.description: You are standing outside a wizarding school in Scotland. The entrance to the castle is to the north. Paths lead east, west, and south.
The Quad.name: The Quad

Dungeons.description: You are in the dungeons. They have obviously not been used or cleaned in a very long time. Slime appears to be oozing from the walls. You are seized by a strong urge to leave to the west.
Dungeons.name: Dungeons

Headmaster's Stairs.description: You are on a tightly wound stone spiral staircase that noiselessy moves under your feet and you switch floors efforlessly. If you lift your foot up, it moves you up and vice versa.
Headmaster's Stairs.name: Headmaster's Stairs

Dark Tunnel.description: You are in a long dark tunnel.
Dark Tunnel.name: Dark Tunnel

Trophy Room.description: You are in the trophy room.
Trophy Room.name: Trophy Room

SWGreatHall.description: You are in the SW corner of the Great Hall. There is a broad archway in the west wall.
SWGreatHall.name: SWGreatHall

Divination.description: You are in the Divining classroom.
Divination.name: Divination
